name: Vogue college of fashion technology
overview: Vogue Institute of fashion technology, a multi - disciplinary, umbrella institute was founded in year 1996 It is a pioneering design incubator that nurtures emerging design talent Education here is centered on the development of ideas Vogue is the hub where designing is induced with passion & standards of design education are set with creative educational culture, development of problem solving capabilities & by promoting design competencies. Well Rounded education in the dynamic world of fashion is our hallmark Seamless educational culture which encourages students to push boundaries & tred on untrodden path is our endeavour Our thought provoking approach inculcates experimentation, independant thought & supports innovation in Art & Design Unrivaled base of creative knowledge & expertise that we offer at vogue allows students to experiment at all levels. Our Academic team, as designers, theorists & critics, pave the path of creative & experimental practice The multi hued combination of students from national & International level, cutting edge research & highly recommended faculty which provides well - tailored support, creates a unique multifaceted learning experience
